reviews.review_msg: By far the worst class I've taken at SFU. Jie argued with her students, was generally rude, and created an uncomfortable classroom environment. Lectures were rambling and incoherent. Poor choice of readings offered little insight into the topics at hand. Showed up late to class every single time. This person needs to take a class on teaching.

Has a really thick accent that is almost impossible to comprehend. She speaks very quickly too, which doesn't help. She is rude, combative, unwilling to accept a perspective other than her own, and does not care about her students (I had been in her class since the beginning of the term, and in week 6, she thought I was a recently enrolled student)
